name: usgrupgr

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c0, cuspgr))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ USGraph, c0 ∈ UPGraph, c0 ∈ USPGraph)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cuspgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ USPGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USPGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)

cumulated.origin:

-| wi(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ USPGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USPGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))

comment: A simple graph is an undirected pseudograph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 15-Oct-2020.)
